original_text: They were on their way up to Jerusalem, with Jesus leading the way, and the disciples were astonished, while those who followed were afraid. Again he took the Twelve aside and told them what was going to happen to him.
korean_text: 예루살렘으로 올라가는 길에 예수께서 그들 앞에 서서 가시는데 그들이 놀라고 따르는 자들은 두려워하더라 이에 다시 열두 제자를 데리시고 자기가 당할 일을 말씀하여 이르시되

sentences.original_text: They were on their way up to Jerusalem
while those who followed were afraid
Again he took the Twelve aside
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다시 열두 제자를 따로 데리고 가서

sentences.original_text: and told them what was going to happen to him
